medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient presented with behavior problems, difficulties in concentration, and sleeping problems.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at the age of 12 years and included behavior problems, concentration difficulties, and sleeping issues. Specific duration and intensity of symptoms were not provided.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient has a mutation identified as Cys636Arg leading to nonautoimmune hyperthyroidism.
medical_history.family_history: Two siblings diagnosed with a different mutation (Pro639Leu) related to congenital hypothyroidism.
